data.name: Outbreak Island: Pendulum
data.detailed_description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1442530/Outbreak_Island/
Outbreak Island: Pendulum is a free version of the open-world survival simulator Outbreak Island.

Welcome to Erlsen Island, a former nature reserve and scientific reservation. This place used to be the center of advanced human brain research. Now the island has become a dangerous place, as its population has gone insane after a mysterious experiment, and at night an eerie green beam of light burns in the sky.

As Detective Howard Chapman, you witness a plane crash. Now you need to find the downed plane because there might be a walkie-talkie to call for help and save your life.



  • Explore a mysterious island full not only of dangers, but also of useful resources and beautiful scenery, for the first time
  • Build weapons and improve your equipment. Procure or find food and medicine at any cost
  • Build your own camp and try to survive on the island at least for one day
  • Move stealthily or fight face-to-face
  • The camera is your greatest ally. Distract the Transformed with your flash. Monitor the situation from a distance to observe the behavior of the locals and animals.



üìíTwitter: https://twitter.com/OutbreakIsland
‚òéÔ∏èDiscord: discord.gg/DPC98xU

data.short_description: Survive and solve the mystery of the plane crash with your camera and tools in Outbreak Island: Pendulum. This is the free version of the survival simulator "Outbreak Island", where you will fight for your life in the atmospheric and beautiful, yet dangerous world of Erlsen Island.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows¬Æ 8.1 / (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible (5.1 surround sound recommended)
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows¬Æ 10 / (64-bit only)
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible (5.1 surround sound recommended)
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard, mouse

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content.
